title: things are wonderful
body: I have been bffls with a girl for about 5months. Things couldn't be better and she ilys me more than i ily her. She's probably the biggest bae that plays this game. This isn't a petanko thread so pls no haterino. Just an appreciation 1 time thread because it's needed. (: I'm so glad she CHOSE me over another guy and it brings a smile to my face every time i think about her liking me instead of that twat. I wont be naming due to privacy and i dont want to embarrass people. (SARTORIOUS IS THE GUY LMFAO) . Thankyou for your time boards :) .

replies.body: i seriously cannot tell if its bait because its posted by officer cait

> [{quoted}](name=Dota2forthewin,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Ax6IIsY8,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-11T02:08:37.753+0000)
>
> i seriously cannot tell if its bait because its posted by officer cait

This exactly. But if it is genuine, congratulations OC. I see the usual Sartorious hate coming out :^)
it's not baiting anyone to get buttmad so no, not a bait. It's truth :) Shes a real babe. Most beautiful young girl i've met :)
That's great for you, meanwhile i'm sitting here behind a computer screen with no life to be had, oh how wonderful this world is.
do you live in melbourne?
Yeah.
want to meet?
Whereabouts do ya live? I'm in Pascoe Vale myself.
Ivanhoe ;o
That's like a 30 min drive ain't it?
im unsure ;o i only recently moved to melb
Oh, what you move here for?
OC gonna hit that aye.
thats rude yo >:[ she is mature and respectable.

> [{quoted}](name=Officer Caitlyn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Ax6IIsY8,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-03-11T23:17:13.825+0000)
>
> thats rude yo >:[ she is mature and respectable.

OC
GON
GET
SUM
my life hasn't been that good :( im always saaaaaaaaaad
Pics or it didn't happen
{{champion:32}}

Grats Caitlyn, or Officer. Sometimes it can feel good when someone chooses you another person, like when my ex chose me over his current girlfriend, although I wish he didn't as he was a giant %%%% (and small in the pants, go figures).

I hope it works out with you two.
i have a feeling it will work out :) she is amazing
